snippet: Andy Murray and Novak Djokovic are careering towards a Sunday showdown to decide their year-long battle for supremacy....
lead_paragraph: Andy Murray and Novak Djokovic are careering towards a Sunday showdown to decide their year-long battle for supremacy.
